data.subtitle: Hola!
data.text: Soy Emilia, una desarrolladora de Javascript junior, con fluidez tanto en frontend como en backend. Uso principalmente React, Redux, Node, Express y Sequalize. Pero me encanta aprender, te invito a poner a prueba mi resiliencia.

data.subtitle: Hi!
data.text: Im Emilia. Im a junior javascript developer, with fluency in both frontend and backend. I use principally React, Redux, Node, Express and Sequalize. I invite you to testing my resilience. I hope you enjoy this web that I develop to demostrate some of my skills.
